name: Trumpet
description: This professional-grade trumpet features a lacquered brass body and stainless steel pistons. It delivers a bright, powerful sound suitable for orchestras and jazz bands. Includes a mouthpiece and hard case.

name: Cornet
description: A high-quality cornet with a rich, mellow tone. It is made from durable brass and has a silver-plated finish. Ideal for both beginners and advanced players. Comes with a mouthpiece and protective case.

name: Flugelhorn
description: This flugelhorn is crafted from yellow brass and features a gold lacquer finish. It offers a warm, dark tone that is perfect for solo performances and ensembles. Includes a mouthpiece and a hard shell case.

name: Trombone
description: A high-quality tenor trombone with a seamless yellow brass bell and a chrome-plated inner slide. It produces a full, rich sound suitable for various musical genres. Comes with a mouthpiece and a durable case.

name: Tuba
description: This concert tuba features a lacquered brass body and a large bore for a deep, resonant tone. It is perfect for symphonies and marching bands. Includes a mouthpiece and a wheeled case for easy transport.
